com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic

Class DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic.DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayeredComponentsMerger

    public class DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger
extends Object
implements ILayeredComponentsMerger
    A default implementation of a ILayeredComponentsMerger that provides simple default behaviors.

    Instances of this class are used internally by HierarchicLayoutCore and MultiComponentLayerer when e.g. the graph is grouped or it consists of more than one connected component.

      • DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger

        public DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger(MergingPolicy policy)

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown policy is given
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicy

        public MergingPolicy getPolicy()
        Gets the merging policy constant as defined in DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown policy is given
        Default Value:
        The default value is MergingPolicy.ADD_RIGHT_TOP_ALIGNED. Nodes of the source layering are to the right of the target layering and all nodes are top-aligned.
        Returns:
        one of the predefined merging policy constants
        See Also:
        setPolicy(MergingPolicy)

      • merge

        public void merge(LayoutGraph graph,
                  ILayoutDataProvider ldp,
                  ILayers srcLayers,
                  ILayers targetLayers)
        Description copied from interface: ILayeredComponentsMerger
        Merges two ILayers instances.

        All nodes that belong to the source and target ILayers are part of the graph at the moment of invocation.

        The state of the source ILayers instance is discarded after this call and does not need to be updated to reflect the changes. The target ILayers instance must be updated accordingly.

        Specified by:
        merge in interface ILayeredComponentsMerger
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph containing the nodes of source and target ILayers instances
        ldp - the ILayoutDataProvider used for querying the layer indices
        srcLayers - the source ILayers instance that will be merged into the target ILayers instance
        targetLayers - the ILayers instance that will be modified to contain the resulting layering

      • setPolicy

        public void setPolicy(MergingPolicy value)
        Sets the merging policy constant as defined in DefaultLayeredComponentsMerger.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown policy is given
        Default Value:
        The default value is MergingPolicy.ADD_RIGHT_TOP_ALIGNED. Nodes of the source layering are to the right of the target layering and all nodes are top-aligned.
        Parameters:
        value - one of the predefined merging policy constants
        See Also:
        getPolicy()
